data.text: @DcKulgam @DrBilalbhatIAS @Mirimtyazulaziz @diprjk Dist Admn is working in a good manner in every field, so for restoration of electricity is concern the damage caused is beyond the control of Dist admn we must appreciate the efforts of PDD and especially the field staff who r doing their best in  order to restore the supply
@DcKulgam @DrBilalbhatIAS @Mirimtyazulaziz @diprjk Electricity has not been yet restored with the vicinity of town.
@DcKulgam @DrBilalbhatIAS @Mirimtyazulaziz @diprjk Why, the work on Mir bazar - Kulgam TL is not complete by now? Why there is still darkness hovering in areas of Kulgam District??
